title: Type Camp 2008 Update
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306010505/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 1.Mar.2008 3.55pm 

Type Camp has updated their site.

From the site: “Type Camp can be whatever the camper needs it to be. It can be rigid, with critique comments being noted for future revisions, or it can be enriching, with a primary goal of exposure to new ideas and subject matter. It can even be a connector, with campers making friends and professional colleagues that last far beyond the event itself. We welcome you to the camp that you’ve always wanted — we welcome you to Type Camp.”

- This year’s fellow instructors announced and introduced  
- 4 events listed for this year including London, Galliano Island, India, and Information Design  
- Registration information

Type Camp London: 9-16 May 2008;  
Featuring: Dr Rathna Ramanathan, Dr Shelley Gruendler, Martin Andrews and others

Type Camp Galiano: 3-8 August 2008;  
Featuring: Tiffany Wardle + Dr Shelley Gruendler

Type Camp Information Design: 10-15 August 2008;  
Featuring: Jay Rutherford, Ben Weiner + Gustavo Soares

Type Camp India: 8-20 Dec 2008;  
Featuring: Dr Rathna Ramanathan + Dr Shelley Gruendler

For more information visit [http://www.typecamp.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306010505/http:/www.typecamp.org/ "http://www.typecamp.org/")
author: Miss Tiffany
